greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Sum of A003958 and its Dirichlet inverse: a(n) = A003958(n) + A097945(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
mathematica: a[1] = 2; a[n_] := Times @@ ((First[#] - 1)^Last[#] & /@ FactorInteger[n]) + MoebiusMu[n] * EulerPhi[n]; Array[a, 60] (* _Amiram Eldar_, Dec 17 2018 *)
program: A003958(n) = { my(f = factor(n)); for(i=1, #f~, f[i, 1]--); factorback(f); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Dec 17 2018
